topic.title: Use same user on different computers?
topic.body: Hello people, I'm planning to open a blog and i'm interested to update that from different computers. It's any method to log in with same ID on two different PCs?

topic.title: identify own Blog directory?
topic.body: Hi people, anyone knows hoy to identify what's the directory of my blog? thanks!

topic.title: 1 File update Failed?
topic.body: Why appears this banner when i try to syncrhonize my blog? :(

1_1MNLXtMWLF4FX32eFfztzru14n7rn7V6nj.body:
> [nofish](#comment_607_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): just copy data/users.json file

thanks dude :)

2_1MNLXtMWLF4FX32eFfztzru14n7rn7V6nj.body:
h> [redacted](#comment_7_19qsuxKBkNZWYft3epWgn6u3gG82sQHs6n): It's data/<public key> under your zeronet directory.

and... how can i know my public key?? :B
okay, i found that, i feel so stupid .__. hahaha
